key.name: domain
key.description: Change this variable only if you are using GitHub Enterprise

key.name: token
key.description: To get your token go to https://github.com/settings/tokens and create a token, making sure you authorize it to access your notifications

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: The refresh interval used by the extension. If this number is smaller than the header returned by github, it will be ignored and the header will take precedence. See https://developer.github.com/v3/activity/notifications/

key.name: notification-activate-action
key.summary: The action to execute when the notification is clicked

key.name: notification-primary-action
key.summary: The primary action, shown as button on the right side

key.name: notification-secondary-action
key.summary: The secondary action, shown as a button on the left side
